'''1.6.4 Build 17'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the seventeenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released in 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Home Block.png|32px]] [[Home Block]]'''
* Individual teleport station block in which the player can teleport to.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:BlockInspector.png|32px]] [[Block Inspector]]'''
* A special item used to identify blocks in the world.

== Changes ==
* Moved "Teleport Self to Spawn" and "Teleport to Surface" buttons from the Assignments menu to the Personal menu on Teacher.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Some mods like Galacticraft not working properly. Some GUIs were not opening.
